sys_variable_value.value: Good news Your Trips Have been Approved

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Health Tracker Record➛Requested for➛First name,

Good news Your Trips Have been Approved.

Have a nice trip.

Hi Trigger➛Health Tracker Record➛Requested for➛First name, 

Unforrtuantelly your trips has been cancelled. 

Please contact your manager if you have any questions. 

Regards, 

It Team
